docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve --livereload - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: GoHighLevel Tags
docs.text: This page contains a comprehensive list of GHL tags.

docs.title: REA Lead
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have yet to win.

docs.title: REA Current
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have won and is currently using us.

docs.title: REA Lost
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have lost.

docs.title: REA Out of Range
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have lost due to them not being within our servicing area.

docs.title: Private
docs.text: The opportunity is for a private client.

docs.title: Portables / Test n Tag
docs.text: The opportunity has fire extinguisher testing included.

docs.title: Retirement Living
docs.text: The opportunity relates to an aged care or retirement living job.

docs.title: Cold Dialler
docs.text: The opportunity has gone cold and needs to be nurtured.

docs.title: Commercial
docs.text: The opportunity relates to a commercial building job.

docs.title: Airbnb
docs.text: The opportunity relates to a Airbnb property job.

docs.title: Agent Lead Won
docs.text:
GHL Name: Won - Moved To

GHL Location: Pipeline: Agents - New Lead / Pipeline Stage: Lost

docs.title: Automation Goal
docs.text:
The goal of the automation is to mark an agent lead as won when its stage gets changed to won.

It achieves this by removing rea lead & rea lost tags and adding rea current along with removing from the Agents - First Contact automation.

docs.title: Automation Process Simplified
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    A[Pipeline Stage Changed To Won]:::orange;
    B[Remove Tags For Leads and Lost]:::orange;
    C[Add REA Current Tag]:::orange;
    D[Remove from First Contact Workflow]:::orange;

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> D

    classDef orange fill:#FF6E42,stroke-width:0px;

docs.title: Automation Process Detailed
docs.text:
%%{init: {"flowchart": {"htmlLabels": true, "useMaxWidth": false}} }%%
flowchart TD
    A["Pipeline Stage Changed
        <a href='\pipelines'>In Pipeline: Agents - New Lead</a>
        <a href='\pipelines\#agents-new-lead-won'>Pipeline Stage: Won</a>
    "]:::orange;
    B["Remove Tags:
        <a href='\tags\#rea-lead'>rea lead</a>
        <a href='\tags\#rea-lost'>rea lost</a>
    "]:::orange;
    C["Add Tags:
        <a href='\tags\#rea-current'>rea current</a>
    "]:::orange;
    D["Remove from Workflows:
        <a href='\automations\agents\lead-won'>Won - Moved To</a>
        <a href='\automations\campaigns\agents\first-contact'>Agents - First Contact
    "]:::orange;

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> D

    classDef orange fill:#FF6E42,stroke-width:0px;
